title: Words and music
creator_credit: Norman Taurog, Arthur Freed and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: A musical version of the lives and work of Richard Rodgers and Lorenz Hart featuring twenty-two of their songs. Cast includes Mickey Rooney (Lorenz Hart), Tom Drake (Richard Rodgers), Marshall Thompson, Janet Leigh, Betty Garrett, Ann Sothern, June Allyson, Perry Como, Judy Garland, Lena Horne, Gene Kelly.
